preprocessing module¶

preprocessing.ann_preprocess(ANNOT_SETS, class_limit)[source]¶
preprocessing.ann_preprocess_2(arr, old_config, new_config)[source]¶

To match arr which has new_config match the old_config of annotations

preprocessing.ann_preprocess_v2(annot_arr, num_exp=3)[source]¶

Only the first annotation is taken from the the annot_arr

preprocessing.avg_exp(image_set)[source]¶

Averaging different exposures into 1 image

preprocessing.get_dataset(dataset_path, num_exp=1)[source]¶

Create the image and annotation dataset from given path. Given path should contain both image and corresponding annotation. Image file as .bmp. Annotation file as .cmp

Parameters

  • dataset_path ([path]) – [Path of the image and annotation files]

  • num_exp (int, optional) – [Number of exposures of images]. Defaults to 1.

Returns

[image array, (num_img, height, width, num_exp)] [numpy.array]: [annotation array, (num_img, height, width, 1)]

Return type

[numpy.array]

preprocessing.img_preprocess(IMAGE_SETS)[source]¶
preprocessing.limit_output_class(y, limited_list)[source]¶

Function to limit the classes of y y - original output array will all classes limited_list - a list of the classes to limit limited_y - output array with lmited classes

preprocessing.resize_arr(arr, new_width, new_height)[source]¶

To resize the the input to the model

preprocessing.split_data(images, labels, RANDOM_STATE=0)[source]¶
preprocessing.stack_exp(image_set)[source]¶

Stacking different exposure levels together (back to back)

preprocessing.stack_exp_v2(image_arr, num_exp=3)[source]¶

To reshape image array [[width, height, 3] * 3] to [[width, height, 9]]
